Improve upward compatibility of SPI Fly to ASM Version 6.x
buginformation.description: In order to get Pax Web 6.0.1-SNAPSHOT (with Jetty) running in Apache Karaf 4.1-SNAPSHOT using the provided feature, an update of the ASM package is required. SPI Fly is required, because the Jetty packages rely on Java's service provider mechanism by placing configuration files in META-INF/services.Is it possible to get a new snapshot release?
